thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 30 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-TFS Financial Corp Reports Qtrly EPS Of $0.08

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-TFS Financial Corp Reports Qtrly EPS Of $0.08
text:
April 30 (Reuters) - TFS Financial Corp:
* TFS FINANCIAL CORP - DAVID S. HUFFMAN, CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER (CFO) OF COMPANY, HAS ANNOUNCED HIS RETIREMENT EFFECTIVE SEPTEMBER 30, 2018
* TFS FINANCIAL CORP - PAUL J. HUML WILL ASSUME ROLE OF CFO ON DATE OF HUFFMANâ€™S RETIREMENT
* TFS FINANCIAL CORP QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.08 * TFS FINANCIAL CORP - NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $71.7 MILLION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 AND $70.3 MILLION FOR THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2017
* TFS FINANCIAL - PROVISION FOR LOAN LOSSES WAS A CREDIT OF $4.0 MILLION FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 VERSUS CREDIT OF $6.0 MILLION FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31,2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
